text: badi budhi aurte jinhe nikaah ki ummid (aur qaahish hee) na rahi ho, wo agar apne kapde utaar rakhe to un par koyi gunaah nahi, bashart ye ke wo apna banaao singaar zaaher karne waaliya na ho, ta ham agar un se bhi ehtiyaath rakhe to un ke liye bahuth afzal hai aur Allah taâ€™ala sunta jaanta hai
